name: Sandhya...
greetingText: I forgot ur birthday last time🙃
wishText: May the natural smile u yours, always be with you! :)
text1: I was sure, i won't miss this time😝
textInChatBox: Happy birthday! Wishing you a day filled with love and laughter...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
